#summary Compilation and installation

= Compilation and installation =

*Dependencies:*
 * CImg (included in the package)
 * Boost.Program_options (for parsing command-line arguments)

*Optional dependencies:*
|| Library  || CMake flag || Enables ||
|| CGAL     || -DWITH_CGAL=ON/OFF || sparse vector fields and related algorithms ||
|| OpenCV   || -DWITH_OPENCV=ON/OFF || OpenCV algorithms ||

*Installation:*
{{{
  cmake . <optional flags>   <- put your CMake flags here
  make
  make install
}}}
